title: Sweet Escape
description: After Julia's close call at the secret society gathering, she sheds her inhibitions and joins Derek for some adult playtime. When things come into clearer focus for Julia, she realizes she has lost her heart to the sexy playboy and is headed for agonizing heartbreak. But Derek just might have some other plans for her. The Billionaire's Son 5 : Sweet Escape is a ~7,600 word erotic romance which contains explicit depictions of sexual acts and a sexy billionaire playboy behaving badly. This story is intended for an adult audience only!
author: Arabella Quinn
